title: Registration is Open for the 2025 Melburn Roobaix
content:
Melbourne, Australia’s longest-running fun ride is back this year for its 20th anniversary! The Melburn Roobaix is a good time for all and registration is now open for the 2025 event on Sunday, the 29th of June. If you’re in the area, roll on over to Fyxo.co to register for $99 AUD and if you’re on the fence, check out our extensive coverage from last year’s event: Melburn Roobaix 2024: Bicycle Heaven!

The post Registration is Open for the 2025 Melburn Roobaix appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
